title: Hour 2: Giant Win?
description:
Michael Irvin and Mina Kimes debate whether the Cowboys still have a postseason shot without Dak. Stephen A. unveils his top 5 NFL teams heading into Week 4. Plus Richard Jefferson reacts to Kevin Durant saying his trade request was caused by "some doubt" about the Nets culture. Later, Mina Kimes says Russell Wilson and the Denver Broncos are lucky to be 2-1.
